## State Transformations 1
* Gas to Liquid
    - melting/fusion
* Liquid to Gas
    - Evaporization, vaporization, boiling
* Gas to liquid
    - Condensation

## State Transformations 2
* Gas to solid
    - Deposition
* Liquid to solid
    - Freezing, solidification
* Solid to gas
    - Sublimation


## Latent Heat
* Heat absorbed or released during phase change
* Condensation releases heat (warms environment)
* Evaporization absorbs heat (cools environment)

## Saturation
